Filing Complaints under IT Act, 2000

Cyber Crime Portal
Report Cyber Crime Online

File your complaint online through the National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal or visit your nearest cyber crime police station. All complaints are processed as per IT Act, 2000 provisions.

Online Complaint Registration

Personal Information

Incident Details

Evidence & Documents

Supported formats: JPG, PNG, PDF, DOC, DOCX (Max 5MB per file)

Declaration

Complaint Processing Steps

1
Submit Complaint

Fill out the online form with all required details and submit evidence.

2
Acknowledgment

Receive complaint number and acknowledgment via SMS/Email.

3
Investigation

Cyber crime cell investigates the case and collects evidence.

4
Resolution

Case closure or legal action as per investigation findings.

üö® Emergency Helpline

1930
National Cyber Crime Helpline
24/7 Toll-Free Support
Call Now

Required Documents

  • Identity Proof (Aadhar/PAN/Passport)
  • Screenshots of fraudulent messages
  • Bank statements (if financial fraud)
  • Transaction details
  • Communication records

Complaint Status

Track your complaint status using the complaint number received after submission.
